Authors:
Fernando Omar Zuloaga, Sandra S. Aliscioni, M. Amalia
Scataglini
Title:
A New Genus of Paniceae from Brazil (Poaceae: Panicoideae:
Paniceae).
Journal: Annals of the Missouri Botanical Garden
Abstract:
Generic boundaries of the South American species Panicum
longipedicellatum are explored and compared with allied genera of the
tribe Paniceae. On the basis of morphological, anatomical and molecular
characters a new genus is proposed. The phylogenetic position of the new
genus within the Paniceae is evaluated.
